title: Friction box 2D - Fun run game android game
description:
Friction box 2D is a fun game which jumps for life from angry zombies & aliens.its clash between friction and zombies. He eats candy for life .This Adventures game will give you nice play with joyful experience .Just get ready for action and stay away from bad things and Go and take your flag with red coins .learning games for kids and  Let the anger be unleashed . 

Friction box  2D Story :
Friction box 2D is free game about Friction which runs for his life and try to be safe from bad arrogant things which can hurt him. Friction goes in world full of action , adventure life in dark world so you must help him to send him to his world dont let him die . Just Jump for his life .
  
FEATURES
- Friction in darker lands.
- Play on any device.
- Totally free lite game to download will remain free forever.
- Easy playing anybody can play this game kids ,old people you will find easy same time hard. 

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap any space on the screen to Jump.
- Stop the enemy from getting closer to you.
- Collect the coins by Jump on them.
Advice :Just Jump and Tap for life .
